entry.title: Bruce Wayne is straight
entry.summary:
Author: Saroyamal

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,847Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 294

Summary: Bruce Wayne has always considered himself straight, until a sex tape of him and Superman is broadcast worldwide. Or, coming back from the dead has left an indelible mark on Clark Kent, and Bruce, as Clark's best friend, volunteered to help him in the way he knows best.
